Method Detail

find

public static <T extends LocalizedPersistentBean> T find(java.lang.Class<T> beanType,
                                                         PersistentBean base,
                                                         java.lang.String language)
Tries to fetch localized part of specified base object for specified language and of type beanType. Always use this method to get specific translations for a base object.

Parameters:
beanType -
base -
language -
Returns:
an object of class beanType or null
